sentence.Network_en: The non - Jains also express high reverence for this Jain festival.

sentence.Network_en: Maha Parva - It is an ancient and chief of all Jain festival.

sentence.Network_en: Govind Jain says: Happiness is the state of mind nothing else.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸福就是对自己人生状态的满意.当感受现实大于期望时,我们就会幸福.
